quest_desc.qdesc:
259 아르젠타의 보양식 퀘스트의 아카데믹 버전. 아카데믹은 본 퀘스트에서 노예의 증거를 받지 않으므로, 여기에서 받게 됩니다.
죽음의 숲 진액 300113 노예의 증거 300003

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta$
…What? What are you looking at? I don't think you would have time to hang around here?
(Need to obtain quest from Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard to proceed)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She wasn't injured while helping others, but I'll let it slide)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
…I heard the news. That Silver-haired Swordswoman was badly injured.
From what I've heard, she was injured while helping Edan and Angelica… She is so amazing.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There is no relationship between a beauty and an injury.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
on top of that, I heard that swordswoman is bery beautiful!
I can see since Edan is blushing and panicking.
Since such a beautiful woman is injured, she would suffer so much!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So there is no relationship between a beauty and an injury!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
Anyway, since she's injured, she must have some invigorating food.
It's not good for a beautiful lady if she doesn't eat well.
In that sense…!!

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
In that sense, why don't you find some invigorating food and bring it to her?
We should always help one another. It's really sad when you're alone while sick. Haha~!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'll find it and give it to her.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
How about making a Forest of Death Sap by slicing up some Blue Mushrooms from the Forest of Death? A little would be fine.
It's from a sap from a poisonous mushroom, so taking too much isn't good for the health.
<html>$For the Beauty$</html>

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
Well, finding 5 Forest of Death Saps is nothing to you, is it?
Now, run along.
She'll need at least that to use it as a cure for a long time and take care of herself!

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
Weakened beauty and some invigorating food….
Good, good. Very good.

$Argenta$
…What? What are you looking at?
I don't think you would have time to hang around here?

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
You have to find 5 Forest of Death Saps.
Well, that's nothing to you, is it? Now, run along.

$Argenta$
…What? What are you looking at?
I don't think you would have time to hang around here?

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
Oh~ Forest of Death Sap… Umm, looks good and smells good! Just by looking at it, you can tell it will go well with a beautiful woman?
Well, even if it contains some amount of poison, if you take it in small portions, it becomes a medicine.

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
Alright.
Hurry, and give that invigorating food to the beauty who is injured.
Don't forget to tell her I sent it!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard sent you this invigorating food…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Huh…? What is this?
Is it food?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She really ate it in one bite)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Invigorating food? If it was an invigorating food, shouldn't it contain meat? Don't know a basic thing...
(Argenta eats the Forest of Death Sap in one bite)
…This is only a mouthful.

$Argenta$
Oh… I lost my apetite.
Did he only give you this much? Well, anyway, tell him to bug off.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, we did receive help from you…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
He doesn't have to be worried about this tiny injury. How dare they get worried about me?
That's more unpleasant.
You and those kids… don't be so presumptuous.

$Argenta$
Oh~ you want to help me, is that it? Well….
When you were fighting that Black Knight, if it were not for me, you wouldn't have been unharmed.
Okay. I'll ask you a favor. And in that sense…

$Argenta$
In that sense, I gave the other kids this, but I'm also going to give you this, too!
The evidence that you became my loyal slave.

$Argenta$
Well, aren't you grateful? You don't have to say thank you. I'm very lenient and very tired right now. I don't need any greetings right now.
Anyway… go and do your report thing and come back.
To that annoying Adventurers' Guild Master.

$Argenta$
Why are you back already?
…I haven't decided yet what to ask you, so come back later.
(Have to report to Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard)

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
So, was the silver-haired swordswoman happy?!
You must be happy you became friends with someone that beautiful because of me. Haha!
Well, you don't have to thank me too much. Haha.

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
What did that beautiful swordswoman say?
Tell me something…
Well, I'm not forcing you to, but… hmm.

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
What?! …You never know what a woman is thinking.
These days in Saint Haven, they say there is a trend that you show no feelings even when you're happy….
It may be something similar.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard$
Anyway, great job.
Tell that silver-haired swordswoman I said hello.

journal.title: Deckard's Consideration
journal.contents:
Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard suggested that we give the injured Argenta some invigorating food.

Calderock Village → Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard

journal.title: Collect Forest of Death Sap
journal.contents:
Whatever the real reason may be, I may have received help from Argenta. So slice up some Blue Mushrooms at the Forest of Death and make some Forest of Death Sap for her.

Gray Ruins → Lower Ridge(Forest of Death Entrance) → Forest of Death
journal.todo_msg: Collect 5 Forest of Death Saps in the Forest of Death.

journal.title: For Argenta
journal.contents:
Per Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard's request, found Argenta's invigorating food. Give Argenta the food.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at the Gray Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Give Forest of Death Sap to Argenta at the Gray Ruins.

journal.title: Argenta's Reaction
journal.contents:
Gave Argenta the invigorating food, but she doesn't seem to like it. Return to Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard and tell him what she said.

Calderock Village → Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard
journal.todo_msg: Report to Adventurers' Guild Master Deckard.
